page.title: 17AMPFIELD JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: The teachers at Ampfield Junior School are Miss J. Lines and Miss House. Miss Lines is the Headmistress. She teaches the younger class and Miss House teaches the older pupils.Miss House has taught there for two years and before that was at a{school}in Basingstoke, Hampshire. She travels to school by car from her home 2 miles away. We interviewed a{pupil}called Elizabeth Gollidge. She lives at Buddys Barn in Ampfield. She is 10 years old and has been going to Ampfield for 6 years, since she was 4 years old. Her hobbies are cycling, brownies, youth club and Sunday Club at St.Matks Church. She cycles to school or she walks.
